articles.description: Two years on from the World Cup final, England and Spain will meet again in what promises to be an "amazing" Euro 2025 final.
articles.title: England v Spain: Euro 2025 showpiece brings repeat of World Cup final

articles.description: Liverpool complete the signing Eintracht Frankfurt striker Hugo Ekitike for an initial £69m, subject to international clearance.
articles.title: Hugo Ekitike: Liverpool sign Eintracht Frankfurt striker

articles.description: Manchester United striker Marcus Rashford joins Barcelona on an initial 12-month loan deal.
articles.title: Marcus Rashford: Barcelona sign Manchester United forward on loan

articles.description: Aitana Bonmati's place at Euro 2025 was under threat when she was struck down with viral meningitis before the tournament. She might yet leave it with a winner's medal.
articles.title: England v Spain: Aitana Bonmati's journey from hospital bed to hero status

articles.description: Watch and follow live as Germany face Spain in the second semi-final at Euro 2025.
articles.title: Germany vs Spain LIVE: Women's Euro 2025 line-ups, kick-off time & updates

articles.description: England are a better side with veteran spinner Liam Dawson included, says former captain Michael Vaughan.
articles.title: England vs India: Liam Dawson makes hosts a better side - Michael Vaughan

articles.description: Marcus Rashford says his choice to join Barcelona was "easy", after completing a season-long loan move from Manchester United.
articles.title: Marcus Rashford: Manchester United striker says Barcelona loan decision was 'easy'

articles.description: Luke Littler survives a real scare before eventually beating Jermaine Wattimena 13-11 in a thriller to reach the World Matchplay quarter-finals, but Michael van Gerwen loses to Josh Rock.
articles.title: World Matchplay Darts: Luke Littler wins thriller but Michael van Gerwen is out

articles.description: England spinner Liam Dawson admits he did not think he would play Test cricket for England again after he made his return against India after a seven-year absence.
articles.title: England v India fourth Test: Liam Dawson on return

articles.description: Jonathan Milan claims his second victory of this year's Tour de France by winning a sprint finish on stage 17.
articles.title: Tour de France 2025 results: Milan wins stage 17 in sprint finish
